title: Lost My Skin
body:
So I recently bought Special Weapon Zac. I went on today and it said I had gifted some random person I don't even know. and I go to play and S
pecial Weapon Zac is gone and I don't even have the RP. I'm really stressed and have tried to send a  support ticket.  Sadly I don't know what category to put it under. please help. PLeas if you have any info please tell me what to do.

replies.body: I went ahead and looked over you account, and I do see a little suspicious activity. Your best bet is to hit us up through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so that we can get your account back in the right hands. Rest assured that we'll be able to take care of any unauthorized activity as well!
